Comment 4: 
gdb says the detection functions look sane

(gdb) disassemble useVFPv1
Dump of assembler code for function useVFPv1:
   0x00009110 <+0>:     vmov.f64        d0, d0
   0x00009114 <+4>:     bx      lr
End of assembler dump.
(gdb) disassemble useVFPv3
Dump of assembler code for function useVFPv3:
   0x00009108 <+0>:     vmov.f64        d0, #112        ; 0x70
   0x0000910c <+4>:     bx      lr
End of assembler dump.
